info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 6 at 3:48PM ChST until November 6 at 4:45PM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Guam.
* WHEN...Until 645 PM ChST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. Rises in small streams.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 348 PM ChST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.4 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.4 to 1.4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON
